name: Cashier Guy
description:
Overview

Cashier Guy is an indie math-survival game revolved around making change under tight time restrictions. Follow temporary cashier Guy's attempt to make change for hasty customers while under pressure from his greedy manager. It's not that simple, Guy realizes, as the cash register slowly breaks down and forces restrictions that bring upon a nightmare of a shift!

Game Features
  • Struggle to make change quickly, accurately, and efficiently with a faulty cash register
  • Survive for 5 minutes without letting Guy quit his job or getting fired
  • Every 30 seconds, an interesting "fun" effect will occur
  • Aim for the final "S" rank

Developer's note: Sorry that this isn't a browser game. When I exported it using HTML5 settings, the game and audio was laggy, and I didn't want to present a game that was less than what it was. Also, the mac and linux versions might not work (as I don't know how to test them), so I'm sorry if those break as well. Thank you for understanding.

This game was developed for My First Game Jam (Summer 2020). Its theme was Change.
